opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Ibp, Inc. v. Alvarez, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated

opinion:
541 U.S. 1028

IBP, INC.
v.
ALVAREZ, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED, ET AL.

No. 03-1238.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 3, 2004.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
